q: The singer is close friends with show supremo Simon Cowell and would be prepared to accept a judging or mentoring role on the new series when it launches later this year. He told the Daily Mail newspaper: Simon Cowell and I have talked about doing things together and I always try to be supportive of people who are friends of mine.
